/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a high vantage point, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street, acting as the main artery of the image, is flanked by lush green trees on both sides, creating a natural canopy overhead. 

Vehicles, including cars and buses, are seen traversing the street, adding a dynamic element to the otherwise serene setting. The sky above is a clear blue, with a few wispy clouds scattered across it. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
